text: In the parc ferme your car weight is 7.3kg higher then the weight determined during the technical inspection. What consequences does your team have to expect?

answer_options.answer_text: no penalty because it is a violation without advantage for the team (only lower weight will result in a penalty)
a 30 sec penalty on your endurance time because it is a violation without advantage for the team

answers.answer_text: no penalty because it is a violation without advantage for the team (only lower weight will result in a penalty)
a 30 sec penalty on your endurance time because it is a violation without advantage for the team

text: Some of your drivers have gone missing on the way to FSA, only 3 drivers each are on site for your EV and IC team.\n Which statements are rules compliant?

answer_options.answer_text: You can share drivers, but they will have to run different events for the two teams
You will need to register five drivers per team, as Endurance/Efficiency count as two towards the two-event limit
You can just skip the secound driver runs on two dynamic events to make do with three registered drivers
You could register on marketing guy/girl per team as additional driver

answers.answer_text: You can share drivers, but they will have to run different events for the two teams
You will need to register five drivers per team, as Endurance/Efficiency count as two towards the two-event limit
You can just skip the secound driver runs on two dynamic events to make do with three registered drivers
You could register on marketing guy/girl per team as additional driver
